name: cocoshammer.js
description: cocosHammer base on Hammer.JS(http://hammerjs.github.io/), use for cocosCreator games, essentially implement a aspect of gesture events, with it, you can recognize some custom gesture events, for example, 'pan' 'swipe' 'tap'...(see http://hammerjs.github.io/api), you can do something with the listener callback. usage is simple, just new on or emit...manipulate like front end EventTarget's addListener dispatch API.
author: huangbuchao
